body.p: The purpose of a ixword is to mark a word as a candidate for an .

tr.td: The word we want to index.
The category or categories we want to put the word in(comma separated). Default is _all.
Any comment we want to make, will be shown in indextables

If markword is set it will represent the word in the running text, except if it is _none. In this case the word will not be present in the text and the module will be referenced directly from an indextable.

body.p: Styleclass describing this PI is: ixword, see distributed std styles.
